Class Deck

java.lang.Object
poker.common.cards.Deck
public class Deck extends Object
Represents a deck of 52 playing cards. Provides factory methods for creating sorted and shuffled decks.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Deck
    createShuffledDeck()
    Factory method: creates a shuffled deck using SecureRandom.

    Factory method: creates a sorted deck (all 52 cards in order).

    • createSortedDeck

      public static Deck createSortedDeck()
      Factory method: creates a sorted deck (all 52 cards in order).
      Returns:
      A new sorted Deck

    • createShuffledDeck

      public static Deck createShuffledDeck()
      Factory method: creates a shuffled deck using SecureRandom.
      Returns:
      A new shuffled Deck

    • createShuffledDeck

      public static Deck createShuffledDeck(SecureRandom random)
      Factory method: creates a shuffled deck using the provided random source.
      Parameters:
      random - The random number generator to use
      Returns:
      A new shuffled Deck

    • shuffle

      public Deck shuffle()
      Shuffles this deck using SecureRandom and returns it.
      Returns:
      This deck (for method chaining)

    • shuffle

      public Deck shuffle(SecureRandom random)
      Shuffles this deck using the provided random source and returns it.
      Parameters:
      random - The random number generator to use
      Returns:
      This deck (for method chaining)

    • draw

      public Card draw()
      Draws the next card from the deck.
      Returns:
      The next Card
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if deck is empty

    • draw

      public List<Card> draw(int count)
      Draws multiple cards from the deck.
      Parameters:
      count - Number of cards to draw
      Returns:
      List of drawn cards
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if not enough cards remain

    • remaining

      public int remaining()
      Returns the number of cards remaining in the deck.
      Returns:
      Number of undrawn cards

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if the deck is empty.
      Returns:
      true if no cards remain

    • size

      public int size()
      Returns the total number of cards in the deck.
      Returns:
      Total card count (52 for a standard deck)

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the deck to its initial state (no cards drawn).

    • getCards

      public List<Card> getCards()
      Returns an immutable view of all cards in the deck.
      Returns:
      Unmodifiable list of cards
